summary: In this context, nitrate (NO3âˆ’) is investigated for its potential influence on muscle contraction and fatigue resistance during a series of knee extension exercises. The study aims to determine whether dietary nitrate affects the ability to sustain maximal contractions over time, suggesting a relationship between nitrate intake and muscle performance during repetitive contractions. However, the specific mechanisms by which nitrate may enhance contraction or fatigue resistance are not detailed in the provided context.
